item_3.title: Rice (iOS App)
item_3.description_short: Rice introduced a new way to trade items
item_3.description_long: Rice is a new way to trade items, it is an app that is much simpler to use and made exclusively for mobile. Running in BETA since June 2014.

item_7.title: Minimal Note-taking UI
item_7.description_short: Really simple, really easy to use note-taking app (Concept)
item_7.description_long: I like using evernote, but there's just too much going on at once -- I don't need to share notes, it's cool I can make notebooks but mostly I just need a fast, quick way to take notes.

item_8.title: [Free PSD] Simple Landing Page
